description: A fresh and vibrant rice salad with plenty of lemon and creamy feta.
keywords: Wild Rice Salad with Broad Beans, Lemon & Feta
name: Wild Rice Salad with Broad Beans, Lemon & Feta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the chopped spring onions, herbs and lemon zest, tossing to combine. Crumble the feta on top and serve.
